content: note that the pattern page contains information for both the celia camisole and the matching shawl 1 skill level intermediate finished measurements **camisole** bust 32 36-40 length 21-1/2 22 - 22-1/2 not including straps or bottom edgings note this garment is designed to fit very close to the body please take this into consideration when choosing your size materials berroco suede 50 grs 6 7-8 balls #3718 holster for camisole crochet hook size 4 50 mm g for camisole two 12 x 12mm natural wood barrel beads optional for camisole gauge 14 double_crochet = 3 10 row = 4 in double_crochet using size 4 50 mm g crochet hook 18 sts = 4 in pat st using size 4 50 g crochet hook cups are made separately then joined bottom front is worked from the bottom edge of the cups down back is also worked from the top down 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/celia-shawl
